title: Handle an Unauthorized Person in a Restricted Area
description: A CCTV operator spots a person without proper PPE walking in a restricted terminal area. They must respond.

tasks.description: Identify the unauthorized individual on the CCTV monitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator spots the person on camera near the quay area.

tasks.description: Dispatch the nearest security patrol to intercept the individual.
tasks.expected_outcome: A security vehicle is sent to the location.

tasks.description: The patrol safely escorts the individual out of the restricted area and to the security office to determine how they gained access.
tasks.expected_outcome: The individual is removed from the dangerous area, and an investigation into the security breach begins.
